item.description:
This concert is about beats and music of the world. Including the Russian balalaika. Its presented by a married couple who are professional entertainers. They are called World Beats with Cosmic Moxa. The children can try and play an instrument and explore and ask questions. Its very laid back and a fun activity to do.

Join us!

Marina.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be there at the door downstairs. Standing and waiting. Cant miss me!

group.name: Families with Russian Kids, Moms Club, Playgroups

item.name: WORLD BEATS CONCERT
